attributes.action: undertake 'Cloud Seeding' over the Atlantic Ocean
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have had too much rain now.  If you could organise to treat the clouds with silver iodide to induce rain over the sea, then the country may have half a chance of drying up

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
